Reviews.Title: “disappointing”
Reviews.Author: EvaMc
Reviews.Content: booked online near airport minibus didnt operate midnight due arrive misunderstanding booking wrong night hotel transfer booking left expensive offer half rack rate pricy 2 morning dont believe expensive left couldnt transfer booking profiteering checked morning friend house dubai negotiated upgrade original bed line ie changed sharp practice avoid ok

Reviews.Title: “Very disappointed”
Reviews.Author: Happy_travel1
Reviews.Content: recently stayed coral oriental dubai disappointment looking forward staying design 4 star hotel time happy 4 star hotel dated bathroom mouldy tiles cracked looked tired worn positive bed proper kingsize comfortable disappointed pool ok maybe investigated pool access meant meant onsite pool 20 min busride provided hotel add public park pay hotel boasts restaurants cafe 24 hours day italian restaurant wasnt time nearly week restaurant didnt serve menu buffet positive staff friendly helpful appeared lack local knowledge course price hotel decent getting deal class hotel 3 star

Reviews.Title: “Adequate, budget friendly hotel.”
Reviews.Author: SparkleMonster
Reviews.Content: perfectly fine hotel budget travellers reasonably clean staff pleasant deal initially trouble finding hotel public transport directions google maps wrong spent 2hrs walking 37 degree heat 20kg backpack trying spoke heard recommend people catch metro train union stop catch taxi rd hotel opposite mosque dont try walk compared western standards hotel advertised 4 star frills perfectly adequate people spend money exploring sleeping stayed solo female traveller urge caution thinking doing similarly whilst hotel fine single women covered originally tried walking streets nearby gold souk 30mins walk definitely idea quickly concluded taking taxi attractions plan hotel fine girls staying themselves please prepared taxi expensive safe sorry

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel but non co-operative staff at reception.”
Reviews.Author: HARDIKMODI
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 8th jan 13 th hotel nice manager couple reception staff manager annoying manages smile allow extra time check 2 hours saying hotel overbooked day whereas wasnt service send extra dish fork 1 time day pay extra 10 dirhams empty plate ridiculous bebut house keeping staff polite soft genuine smile greeted guests seeing mannered called bosses written negatives hotel doesnt mean bad hotelits jus 34 staff people inefficient otherwise recommend

HotelInfo.Name: Coral Oriental Dubai
HotelInfo.Address: Al Naif Road | PO Box No 83252, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
